TextView.android:text: Repair Work Order Completion
Building Name:
JOB HAZARD ANALYSIS AT REPAIR WORK ACTIVITY
Branch Code
Nature Of Work
1. Mechanic / team aware of standard repair process and understand to perform activity
2. mechanic trained / competent to conduct the process
3. All process related PPEs are available
4. Proper and special Tools are available
5. Mechanics not working at different levels
6. Barricade and maintenance display card available
7. Disconnecting of electrical circuit while on work
8. Certified Hoisting tools used in process
MACHINE ROOM
1. Access to Machine room is safe & Well lit.
2. Lighting is adequate on machine room
3. Floor is free of oil & material which may cause tripping Hazard
4. Oils & Lubricants are in closed & sealed containers
5. Speed governor functional
6. Safe means of hoisting is available. (Capacity,hook locking,etc)
CAR AND CWT
1. Emergency stop switch easily accessible & identified in Car and Cwt
2. Emergency stop switch functional & verified in Car and Cwt
3. car top inspection box installed & Functioning properly and verified
4. Lighting is adequate on car top
5. Car top barricade angle installed (To loop FBH while on work)
6. Car top wiring guarded to ensure no physical damage of cables / wire while on work
7. Tools & material required for repair activity placed safely on car top
8. Mechanical safety gear (OSG) functional
1. Lighting is adequate on hoist way
2. All covers / Fascia installed
3. Hoistway screening / protection installed
1. Emergency stop switch easily accessible & identified. Functional & Verified in Pit
2. Emergency stop switch functional & verified
3. Lighting is adequate on Pit
4. Pit ladder is installed & easily accessible
5. CWT screen guard installed & level below CWT buffer top
6. Exercise caution while working on duplex shafts where PIT separation is not done
7. Floor must be free of water leakage, oil & materials which may cause tripping Hazard
Remarks : (Potential Hazard identified & action taken)
Mechanic Name
Mechanic EMP No.
Mechanic Signature Date
Mechanic Signature
Zonal/Route Engineer Name
Zonal/Route Engineer EMP No.
Zonal/Route Engineer Signature Date
Select Zonal/Route Engineer Signature Date
Zonal/Route Engineer Signature
Completed Date
